ct:Test.name: BurstCounterStepTOD
ct:Test.description: The burst counter should be one higher with regard to the previous burst counter

ct:Tests.ct:Test: if(index(..) == 0, index(../../..) == 0 || int(../meas_conf_flags/blnk_blk) == 1 || int(../../../..[index(:/../../..) - 1]/time_orb_data[19]/meas_conf_flags/blnk_blk) == 1 || int(.) == int(../../../..[index(:/../../..) - 1]/time_orb_data[19]/burst_count) + 1, int(../meas_conf_flags/blnk_blk) == 1 || int(../..[index(:/..) - 1]/meas_conf_flags/blnk_blk) == 1 || int(.) == int(../..[index(:/..) - 1]/burst_count) + 1)

ct:Test.name: DSDTotalSize
ct:Test.description: The total dataset size should equal the DSR size times the number of DSRs

ct:Test.name: DSDTypeMDSR
ct:Test.description: The DSD type should be M for DSDs that refer to measurement datasets

ct:Test.name: EnumDSDType
ct:Test.description: The DSD type should be either M, G, or R

ct:Test.name: EnumDSDTypeWithSpare
ct:Test.description: The DSD type should be either 'M', 'G', 'R' or ' '

ct:Test.name: EnumFlag
ct:Test.description: The Flag field should be either 0 or 1

ct:Test.name: EnumOrbitAscendingFlag
ct:Test.description: The orbit ascending flag should be either A or D

ct:Test.name: EnumOrbitVectorSource
ct:Test.description: orbit vector source should match one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Test.name: EnumSiralConfiguration
ct:Test.description: The siral configuration should match one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Test.name: EnumSiralOperativeMode
ct:Test.description: The siral operative mode should match one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Tests.ct:Test: str(.) == "LRM " || str(.) == "SAR " || str(.) == "SARIN " || str(.) == "CAL1_LRM " || str(.) == "CAL1_SAR " || str(.) == "CAL1_SARIN" || str(.) == "CAL2_SAR " || str(.) == "CAL2_SARIN" || str(.) == "CAL3 " || str(.) == "ACQ " || str(.) == "TRK_SAR " || str(.) == "TRK_SARIN " || str(.) == "CAL4 "

ct:Test.name: FileNameCheckDBL
ct:Test.description: The name of the DBL file should be consistent with the product name in the MPH

ct:Test.name: FileNameCheckEEF
ct:Test.description: The name of the EEF file should be consistent with the product name in the fixed header

ct:Test.name: FileNameCheckHDR
ct:Test.description: The name of the HDR file should be consistent with the product name in the fixed header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileClass
ct:Test.description: The class of the file should be consistent with the product name

ct:Tests.ct:Test: (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "OPER" && str(.) == "Routine Operations") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "LTA_" && str(.) == "LTA Reprocessed Files") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "NRT_" && str(.) == "Near-Real-Time Processing") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "OFFL" && str(.) == "Off-Line Processing") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "RPRO" && str(.) == "Re-Processing") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "TEST" && str(.) == "Test Data Set") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "SVT1" && str(.) == "Satellite Validation Test 1") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "SVT2" && str(.) == "Satellite Validation Test 2") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "SVT3" && str(.) == "Satellite Validation Test 3") || (substr(3, 4, str(../File_Name)) == "SVT4" && str(.) == "Satellite Validation Test 4")

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileType
ct:Test.description: The type of the file should be consistent with the product name

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileVersion
ct:Test.description: The version of the file should be consistent with the product name

ct:Test.name: FixedValue0
ct:Test.description: The value of this field should be 0

ct:Test.name: L0GapsField
ct:Test.description: The level 0 gaps flag should be 1 if and only if the number of gaps is greather than 0 (and 0 otherwise)

ct:Test.name: L0QualityThreshold
ct:Test.description: The level 0 processing flag should be 1 if and only if the quality is less than the given threshold (and 0 otherwise)

ct:Test.name: L1BQualityThreshold
ct:Test.description: The level 1b processing flag should be 1 if and only if the quality is less than the given threshold (and 0 otherwise)

ct:Test.name: L1QualityThreshold
ct:Test.description: The level 1 processing flag should be 1 if and only if the quality is less than the given threshold (and 0 otherwise)

ct:Test.name: L2QualityThreshold
ct:Test.description: The level 2 processing flag should be 1 if and only if the quality is less than the given threshold (and 0 otherwise)

ct:Test.name: MPHProductSize
ct:Test.description: The size reported in the MPH should equal the actual product size

ct:Test.name: MPHRefDocL0
ct:Test.description: The REF_DOC field in the MPH should have the value 'CS-ID-ACS-GS-0119 03.03'

ct:Test.name: MPHRefDocL1
ct:Test.description: The REF_DOC field in the MPH should have the value 'CS-RS-ACS-GS-5106 04.60'

ct:Test.name: MPHRefDocL2
ct:Test.description: The REF_DOC field in the MPH should have the value 'CS-RS-ACS-GS-5123 02.05'

ct:Test.name: MPHRefDocOP
ct:Test.description: The REF_DOC field in the MPH should have the value 'C2-RS-ACS-ESL-5213 1.40'

ct:Test.name: MPHSensingTimeOrder
ct:Test.description: Start sensing time should be before stop sensing time

ct:Test.name: MPHStartTimeAISP
ct:Test.description: The start time in the MPH should be the same as the start time of the first Instrument Source Packet in the product

ct:Test.name: MPHStopTimeAISP
ct:Test.description: The stop time in the MPH should be the same as the start time of the last Instrument Source Packet in the product

ct:Test.name: RangeAGC
ct:Test.description: The AGC should be between 0 and 6200

ct:Test.name: RangeAGCOrFlagged
ct:Test.description: The AGC should be between 0 and 6200 or the AGC_Inconsistency flag should be set

ct:Test.name: RangeAltitudeCOG
ct:Test.description: The CoG altitude should be between 700000000mm and 750000000mm

ct:Test.name: RangeAltitudeCOGOrBlank
ct:Test.description: The CoG altitude should be between 700000000mm and 750000000mm

ct:Test.name: RangeAltitudeCOGOrBlankOP
ct:Test.description: The CoG altitude should be between 700000000mm and 750000000mm

ct:Test.name: RangeBackscatterSigmaZero
ct:Test.description: The backscatter sigma zero should be between -2500 and 6000 (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeCoherence
ct:Test.description: The coherence should be between 0 and 10000

ct:Test.name: RangeDeltaTime
ct:Test.description: The delta time should be between 0 and 1E6

ct:Test.name: RangeDryTroposphericCorrection
ct:Test.description: The Dry tropospheric correction should be between -2500mm and -1700mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeEchoesBeamsAveraged
ct:Test.description: The number of Echoes or Beams averaged should be between 30 and 280

ct:Test.name: RangeEquilibriumOceanTide
ct:Test.description: The long period equilibrium ocean tide should be between -1500mm and 1500mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeFreeboard
ct:Test.description: The freeboard should be between -500mm and 5000mm (or equal -9999mm)

ct:Test.name: RangeGeocentricPolarTide
ct:Test.description: The geocentric polar tide should be between -100mm and 100mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeInstrumentIdentifier
ct:Test.description: The SIRAL instrument identifier should be either 'A' or 'B'

ct:Test.name: RangeInverseBarometricCorrection
ct:Test.description: The Inverse barometric correction should be between -500mm and 500mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeIonosphericCorrection
ct:Test.description: The ionospheric correction should be between -1500mm and 0mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeLatitude_7
ct:Test.description: Latitude should be between -90E7 and 90E7 degrees

ct:Test.name: RangeLatitudeOrBlank_7
ct:Test.description: Latitude should be between -90E7 and 90E7 degrees

ct:Test.name: RangeLatitudeOrBlankOP_7
ct:Test.description: Latitude should be between -90E7 and 90E7 degrees

ct:Test.name: RangeMicrosecond
ct:Test.description: The number of microseconds relative to a second should be in the range [0..999999]

ct:Test.name: RangeMicrosecondOrBlank
ct:Test.description: The number of microseconds relative to a second should be in the range [0..999999]

ct:Test.name: RangeMispointingAttitudeAngle
ct:Test.description: The mispointing attitude angle (10^-2) should be between 0 and 200

ct:Test.name: RangeMSSGeoidHeight
ct:Test.description: The MSS/geoid height should be between -200000mm and 200000mm

ct:Test.name: RangeOceanLoadingTide
ct:Test.description: The ocean loading tide should be between -100mm and 100mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeOceanTide
ct:Test.description: The ocean tide should be between -10000mm and 10000mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangePeakiness
ct:Test.description: The Peakiness should be between 0 and 64000

ct:Test.name: RangePhaseDifference
ct:Test.description: The phase difference should be between -pi*10^-6 and pi*10^-6

ct:Test.name: RangeSensingStartStop
ct:Test.description: The time value should be between the sensing start/stop times of the MPH

ct:Test.name: RangeSensingStartStopOrBlank
ct:Test.description: The time value should be between the sensing start/stop times of the MPH

ct:Test.name: RangeSensingTAIStartStop
ct:Test.description: The time value should be between the record TAI start/stop times of the SPH

ct:Test.name: RangeRecordTAIStartStopOrBlank
ct:Test.description: The time value should be between the record TAI start/stop times of the SPH

ct:Test.name: RangeSeaStateBiasCorrection
ct:Test.description: The sea state bias correction should be between -150mm and 0mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeSeaSurfaceHeightAnomaly
ct:Test.description: The sea surface height anomaly should be between -5000mm and 5000mm

ct:Test.name: RangeSecond
ct:Test.description: The number of seconds relative to a day should be in the range [0..86400]

ct:Test.name: RangeSecondOrBlank
ct:Test.description: The number of seconds relative to a day should be in the range [0..86400]

ct:Test.name: RangeSnowDepth
ct:Test.description: The snow depth should be between 0mm and 5000mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeSolidEarthTide
ct:Test.description: The solid earth tide should be between -1000mm and 1000mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeSurfaceHeight
ct:Test.description: The height of the surface w.r.t. the ellipsoid should be between -430000 and 8800000

ct:Test.name: RangeSurfaceTypeFlag
ct:Test.description: The surface type flag should be 0, 1, 2, or 3

ct:Test.name: RangeTotalFixedGain
ct:Test.description: The Total Fixed Gain should be between 0 and 6200

ct:Test.name: RangeWetTroposphericCorrection
ct:Test.description: The Wet tropospheric correction should be between -500mm and 0mm (or missing)

ct:Test.name: RangeWindowDelay
ct:Test.description: The window delay should be between 4.669E9 and 5.0135E9

ct:Test.name: RecordCountMDSR
ct:Test.description: The record counter should equal the MDSR index

ct:Test.name: SequenceCounterStep
ct:Test.description: The sequence counter should be one higher (modulo 16384) with regard to the previous sequence counter

ct:Test.name: SequenceCounterStepTOD
ct:Test.description: The sequence counter should be one higher (modulo 16384) with regard to the previous sequence counter

ct:Tests.ct:Test: if(index(..) == 0, index(../../..) == 0 || int(../meas_conf_flags/blnk_blk) == 1 || int(../../../..[index(:/../../..) - 1]/time_orb_data[19]/meas_conf_flags/blnk_blk) == 1 || int(.) == (int(../../../..[index(:/../../..) - 1]/time_orb_data[19]/src_seq_count) + 1) % 16384, int(../meas_conf_flags/blnk_blk) == 1 || int(../..[index(:/..) - 1]/meas_conf_flags/blnk_blk) == 1 || int(.) == (int(../..[index(:/..) - 1]/src_seq_count) + 1) % 16384)

ct:Test.name: SPHAbsoluteOrbitOrder
ct:Test.description: The start absolute orbit should be before the end orbit

ct:Test.name: SPHDownlinkTimeOrder
ct:Test.description: The downlink utc start time should be before the end time

ct:Test.name: SPHRecordTaiTimeOrder
ct:Test.description: Start record TAI time should be before stop time

ct:Test.name: SPHSensingTimeTAIOrder
ct:Test.description: Start sensing time TAI should be before stop sensing time TAI

ct:Test.name: UnitVector_6
ct:Test.description: The three array elements should form a unit vector (using a scale factor of 10^-6)

ct:Test.name: UnitVectorOrBlank_6
ct:Test.description: The three array elements should form a unit vector (using a scale factor of 10^-6)

ct:Test.name: ValidityPeriodOrder
ct:Test.description: Validity start time should be before validity stop time

ct:Test.name: ValueOfCountAttributeForParent
ct:Test.description: The value for the count attribute of the parent List_of_... element should equal the number of occurences of this element
